title: 🌶️ Moroccan Spicy Fish 🐟
description: A classic shabbat recipe passed down through generations.

steps.instruction: In a large bowl, combine apples, sugar, flour, cinnamon, nutmeg, and lemon juice. Toss to coat.
Place one pie crust in a 9-inch pie plate. Fill with apple mixture.
Top with second crust. Seal edges and cut slits in top to allow steam to escape.
Bake for 45–50 minutes or until crust is golden brown and apples are tender.

notes: You can mix tart and sweet apples for a balanced flavor.
author: Meme
